EditTextPreference.android:title: Remote node address
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The IP address and port number of your remote full node. If your device is not on the same network as it, you will have to port forward.

EditTextPreference.android:title: API password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The API password set on your remote full node.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Run local node off WiFi
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Run the local node in the background even when not connected to WiFi. WARNING: Syncing the blockchain can involve a lot of downloading.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum battery level to run local node

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use external storage
SwitchPreference.android:summary: A full local node uses about 5GB of storage. By default it uses internal storage. Restart Sia Mobile after changing this. It's recommended you clear existing data using the button at the bottom of settings before changing this.

ListPreference.android:title: Launch screen
ListPreference.android:summary: The screen to load to when Sia Mobile launches.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Hide net-zero transactions
SwitchPreference.android:summary: For each regular transaction, Sia also makes a setup transaction that does not affect your wallet balance.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Displayed decimal precision
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The number of decimal places displayed. This does not affect actual precision of values in memory, which is exact. When displayed, they will be rounded up.

Preference.android:title: Open Application Info page for Sia Mobile
Preference.android:summary: Sia Mobile must save a lot of data when running a full node on your device. You can clear this data from here. WARNING: it will delete your wallet files if running a full node on this device. Write down your seed first.
